exceptions.tactic: intros X Y f T1 T2 x.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce Intersection to an evaluable reference.
In environment X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y T1, T2 : Ensemble Y Unable to unify "Intersection (inverse_image f T1) (inverse_image f T2)" with "inverse_image f (Intersection T1 T2)".

original: intros X Y f T1 T2 x. unfold inverse_image, Intersection. split. - intros H. destruct H as [x' [H1 H2]]. split. + exists x'. split; auto. + exists x'. split; auto. - intros [H1 H2]. destruct H1 as [x' [H1 H2]]. destruct H2 as [x'' [H3 H4]]. exists x''. split; split; auto.
